mapper.select: select s.id, s.student_number, s.name, concat(YEAR(s.enrollment_time), '级') as grade, s.free_times, s.max_score from pre_registration as pr left join student s on pr.student_id = s.id where pr.student_id not in (select s1.id, s1.csp_id, s1.student_id, s1.type from ((select * from registration where csp_id = #{cid}) as s1) left join pre_registration as pr on s1.csp_id = pr.csp_id and s1.student_id = pr.student_id)
select s.id, s.student_number, s.name, concat(YEAR(s.enrollment_time), '级') as grade, s.free_times, s.max_score from registration as r left join student s on s.id = r.student_id where r.miss = 0
